hero.subtitle: Explore teachings on numeric sequences, concentration methods, and harmonious development ‚ú®

about.title: About Grigori Grabovoi
about.p1: (born on November 14, 1963) is a mathematician, academic, and Russian-Kazakh author known worldwide for his teachings on numeric sequences for healing, concentration methods, and harmonious development.
about.p2: He has devoted his life to developing technologies for salvation and eternal development. His doctrine focuses on ‚ÄúGeneral Salvation and Harmonious Development‚Äù, emphasizing that each person can shape their destiny through conscious control of life events.

guide.subtitle: Methods, exercises, and recommendations to apply Grigori Grabovoi's teachings
guide.applicationMethodsSubtitle: Different ways to work with the sequences
guide.optimalMentalState: Optimal Mental State: Joy, Light, and Love

levels.allLevelsDesc:
‚ú® ALL LEVELS

This method is suitable for:

‚Ä¢ Beginners who are starting
‚Ä¢ Intermediate practitioners
‚Ä¢ Advanced users

No prior experience required and can be used by anyone, regardless of their familiarity with Grabovoi's teachings.
levels.beginnerDesc:
üå± BEGINNER LEVEL

This method is ideal for:

‚Ä¢ People who are starting
‚Ä¢ No prior experience needed
‚Ä¢ Simple and straightforward exercises
‚Ä¢ Short practice time (5-10 minutes)

Recommended as the first method to familiarize yourself with the techniques.
levels.intermediateDesc:
‚≠ê INTERMEDIATE LEVEL

This method requires:

‚Ä¢ Basic experience with the sequences
‚Ä¢ Greater mental concentration
‚Ä¢ Medium practice time (10-20 minutes)
‚Ä¢ Understanding of fundamental concepts

Recommended after mastering the basic methods.
levels.advancedDesc:
üöÄ ADVANCED LEVEL

This method requires:

‚Ä¢ Considerable experience with the practices
‚Ä¢ High concentration capacity
‚Ä¢ Extended practice time (20+ minutes)
‚Ä¢ Mastery of multiple techniques

Recommended only for experienced practitioners.

webinars.title: Webinars & Videos
webinars.subtitle: Collection of 10 YouTube webinars with key teachings and practical exercises

designs.title: üé® Unique Designs Gallery
designs.subtitle: Explore all visual effects and custom styles available to make your app unique
designs.referenceGalleryDesc: This is a visual gallery showing all the custom styles, effects, and animations that are already integrated in the application.
designs.activeStylesDesc: All these effects are already working in different sections of the app (sequences, books, journal, etc.).
designs.interactiveDemosDesc: Click the buttons to see demonstrations of how the effects work. The buttons have sample messages.
designs.forDevelopersDesc: If you're a developer, you can copy the CSS classes shown (e.g.: bg-gradient-cosmic) to use these styles in new components.

howToUseSteps.s1: Explore each section to see the different visual effects available
howToUseSteps.s2: Observe how gradients, animations, glass effects, etc. look
howToUseSteps.s3: Click the interactive buttons to see the demos in action
howToUseSteps.s4: Read the example codes (in gray) below each effect
howToUseSteps.s5: Remember: These styles are already applied throughout the app, just enjoy them! üé®

designs.tryDemoAlert:

You can click any button to see how the effects work.

Explore each section! üé®

glassmorphism.card1Content: This design uses backdrop-filter: blur() to create a modern and elegant glass effect.

prk1u.title: PRK-1U Device
prk1u.subtitle: Revolutionary Technology for Concentration Development
prk1u.whatIsDesc: The PRK-1U is a revolutionary technological device developed by Dr. Grigori Grabovoi, based on his registered scientific patents. It is a unique tool in the world designed to amplify the user's mental concentrations.
prk1u.practiceNow: Practice Now on Our Online Platform!
prk1u.practiceNowDesc: Access our interactive PRK-1U simulator and start performing the 4 fundamental exercises with real-time guidance.
prk1u.emotionalDesc: This emotional state produces the strongest light for manifestation. Cultivate these feelings during your concentrations to exponentially amplify the effectiveness of the PRK-1U.

features.eventControlDesc: Facilitates conscious control of events and goal manifestation
features.healthRestorationDesc: Normalization of body functions and cellular regeneration
features.clairvoyanceDesc: Expansion of consciousness and perceptive abilities
features.eternalLifeDesc: Ultimate goal: harmonious development and eternal life

operation.title: How the PRK-1U Works
operation.subtitle: Scientific basis and operating principles
operation.fundamentalDesc: The device operates on the principle that human thought emits a weak light signal (biosignal) that can exist in two quantum states simultaneously.

steps.captureDesc: When you focus your thought on the PRK-1U, the thought radiation (which includes your objective) is directed to the device's lenses
steps.amplificationDesc: The device processes these signals through optical light transmissions
steps.potentiationDesc: Adds electromagnetic fields through microelectronic components
steps.returnDesc: The amplified biosignal is returned to the user, intensifying the impact on events

optical.name: Three-Lens Optical System
optical.desc: At the top, of different diameters

ai.name: Mechanical Artificial Intelligence
ai.desc: Adapts the device according to load

eternity.name: Matter of Eternity
eternity.desc: Positive influence on individual and environment

rangeItems.sleep: Continues interacting with your biosignal even when you sleep

methods.title: Concentration Methods with PRK-1U
methods.subtitle: Four main methods for working with the device

method1.name: Method 1: Present and Future
method1.use: For current events or those you want to materialize in the future
steps: Clearly define and visualize the objective
Concentrate on the smaller lens
Mentally insert the objective into the lens
Counterclockwise movement through all lenses
Repeat 3-12 cycles
Observe sensations and document
method1.duration: Minimum 8 min, ideal 20 min, optimal 1 hour+

method2.name: Method 2: Past Events
method2.use: To normalize, heal, or transform past events
steps: Identify past event to normalize
Visualize the transformed and harmonious version
Tune in with internal optical unit
Clockwise movement through the lenses
Feel the normalization of the event
Give thanks for the transformation

method3.name: Method 3: Numeric Sequences
method3.use: Combine Grabovoi sequences with PRK-1U lenses
steps: Select appropriate sequence
Visualize first digit (silver, 3D, in motion)
Locate digit on metal plates
Double concentration (digit + adjacent lens)
Mentally insert digit into lens
Repeat complete sequence 3-7 times
method3.extra: üí° Enhancement: Adding current date (DDMMYYYY) intensifies the effect

method4.name: Method 4: Pure Objective
steps: Clearly define and write down objective
Detailed visualization (images, emotions)
Concentrate on smaller lens
Insert complete visualization into lens
Move to the left (counterclockwise)
Maintain constant visualization
End with gratitude

instructions.guideSubtitle: Step-by-step instructions to connect with the device and perform the 4 fundamental exercises

step1.title: Step 1: How to Connect with the Device
step1.subtitle: Establish conscious connection with the PRK-1U
step1.circularDesc: Make a circular movement with your gaze, concentrating from the smaller diameter lens counterclockwise toward the larger lens.
step1.contactDesc: Direct your gaze to the small lens and say:
step1.phrase: "I am developing the concentrations of eternal life"
step1.contactNote: Then move to the second lens and the third, repeating the phrase and moving your gaze in a circle above the lenses.
step1.confirmationDesc: Continue until you feel you have connected with the device and, through it, with the structure of Eternity. This sensation is unique to each person.

step2.title: Step 2: How to Work with Your Objectives
step2.subtitle: Mental Sphere Technique for manifestation
step2.createSphereDesc: Mentally generate a sphere of light in front of you. This will be the container for your objective.
step2.placeObjectiveDesc: Place inside the sphere your objective, represented as:
placeObjectiveList: Or simply the information formulated briefly and concisely
step2.positiveVizDesc: Always imagine the objective ALREADY ACHIEVED
step2.positiveVizDont: ‚ùå DO NOT visualize the current negative situation
step2.positiveVizDo: ‚úÖ DO visualize the ideal future reality you want to create
step2.concentrationDesc: Place the sphere inside the small lens of the device. Concentrate on the objective as an already achieved reality, maintaining attention.
step2.convictionDesc: Maintain the conviction that with this action that reality is already being created, and will only need reinforcement with successive concentrations.

exercises.title: The 4 Fundamental Exercises
exercises.subtitle: Official protocol by Grigori Grabovoi for integral development

rejuvenation.title: Exercise 1: Rejuvenation
rejuvenation.preparationDesc: Bring a photo of yourself from your youth, from a moment when you were happy and well both physically and emotionally. Not just a "nice" photo, but one that captures a state of fullness.
rejuvenation.objectiveDesc: Return to that age - not necessarily in external appearance, but rather to the state of youth in general.
steps: Observe your youth photo
Generate the mental sphere in front of you
Place inside the image of your full youth
Position the sphere in the small lens
Concentrate on the image and thought of rejuvenation
Perform the turns with your gaze above the lenses
Maintain concentration until you feel it's enough
rejuvenation.durationNote: ‚è±Ô∏è Duration: Duration is never predetermined. With practice, your internal sensations will indicate when to finish.

eventControl.title: Exercise 2: Event Control
eventControl.preparationDesc: Clearly define your objective: healing, job change, relationship improvement, etc.
eventControl.objectiveDesc: Manifest or bring closer the desired event by working from within.
steps: Define your objective clearly
Generate the mental sphere in front of you
Place your objective inside (image or information)
Make sure to visualize the POSITIVE result already achieved
Position the sphere in the small lens
Perform the turns with your gaze
Maintain concentration with conviction
If you lose concentration, rest and resume
eventControl.exampleDesc: To heal a liver problem: DO NOT visualize the sick liver, but rather a perfect liver functioning well. You can include dynamic images like yourself eating foods you currently can't tolerate.

clairvoyance.title: Exercise 3: Control Clairvoyance
clairvoyance.preparationDesc: Choose a place where you have been recently: a store, theater, friend's house, etc.
clairvoyance.objectiveDesc: Develop your capacity for spiritual vision by seeing what is not in front of your physical eyes.
steps: Recall the COMPLETE image of the chosen place
Visualize down to the smallest detail
Generate the mental sphere
Place inside your objective: "Development of my clairvoyance"
Position the sphere in the small lens
While visualizing the place, perform the turns with your gaze
Maintain the practice until you feel connection
clairvoyance.note: üíé Note: This is an exercise of spiritual vision. It's not about remembering, but about SEEING with the inner eyes.

forecast.title: Exercise 4: Control Forecast
forecast.preparationDesc: Prepare to expand your consciousness toward the distant future.
forecast.objectiveDesc: Develop control forecast capacity by visualizing your life in eternity.
steps: Imagine yourself a thousand years from now (or a million)
Visualize what your life is like at that time
Define: What do you do?
What family and work do you have?
What is your environment like?
What objectives do you have in eternal life?
Generate the sphere with your objective: "Development of control forecast"
While visualizing, perform the turns with your gaze
Maintain concentration on your eternal future
forecast.note: ‚ú® Note: This exercise expands your temporal consciousness and connects you with your eternal nature.

visual.title: Visual Connection
visual.desc: The connection between the device and your consciousness happens through the GAZE. You cannot work with your eyes closed.

rest.title: Visual Rest
rest.desc: Train your eyes so they don't tire quickly. If they get tired, you can look through the device without fixing your gaze, or rest completely.

noTension.title: No Tension
noTension.desc: Work without body or eye tension. If fatigue is noticeable, stand up, move around, and then resume work.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.desc: Use all your creativity when formulating your objectives. Dynamic images are more powerful than static ones.

positivity.title: Positivity
positivity.desc: Don't start from the "problem" you have, but from the ideal future reality you want to create with the light of your thought.

regular.title: Regular Practice
regular.desc: Reinforce your objectives with successive concentrations. Consistency is key to manifestation.

protocol.title: Official Test Protocol (48 hours)
protocol.subtitle: Protocol designed by Grigori Grabovoi to systematically measure the development of your capabilities
protocol.intro: This is the official protocol to test the PRK-1U device in a structured way over 48 hours:

c1.title: Rejuvenation Control
c1.desc: Development of concentrations for eternal life for rejuvenation
c1.what: Perform the rejuvenation exercise before and after using the device. Note the differences in your experience.

c2.title: Event Control
c2.desc: Development of concentrations for eternal life to adjust different events to the norm
c2.what: Work with a specific event you want to manifest. Compare your concentration capacity before and after.

c3.title: Clairvoyance Control
c3.desc: Development of concentrations for eternal life for directive clairvoyance development
c3.what: Practice seeing remote places clearly. Note if your inner vision becomes sharper.

c4.title: Forecast Control
c4.desc: Development of concentrations for eternal life for directive forecast capacity development
c4.what: Visualize your eternal future. Observe if the connection with your future self intensifies.

protocol.note: üìù Note: You can keep a journal of your experience during the 48 hours, noting sensations, perceived changes, and results obtained in each of the 4 controls.

warnings.title: Important Notes
warnings.notMedical: The PRK-1U IS NOT a medical device and does not cure or diagnose diseases
warnings.experimental: Experimental use for personal development and education
warnings.noGuarantee: Results not guaranteed - experience varies by individual
